short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly switch between Salesforce setup page and home page with a button click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're the kind of person who finds it frustrating to navigate Salesforce the long way, this extension is for you!
Tired of clicking the gear icon, waiting for the Setup button to appear, then clicking again to load the Setup page? And after that, when you want to return to Home, you have to either search for it or manually navigate back—making it a tedious and time-consuming process.

QuickSwitch changes all of that! With just one click or a simple keyboard shortcut, you can switch between Setup and Home instantly, without the hassle.

New in this version:

Now supports Salesforce URLs under *.salesforce-setup.com for seamless navigation in all environments.
Why QuickSwitch?

Instant Setup Access: No more waiting for the Setup button—jump straight to the Setup page from Home with a single click.
Easy Return to Home: When you're in Setup, skip the manual navigation—go back to the Home page instantly with QuickSwitch.
Shortcuts for Speed: You can use system keyboard shortcuts for even quicker navigation between pages.
Open in New Tab: Need to multitask? Open either Setup or Home in a new tab without disturbing your current work.
User-Friendly Design: Powered by Salesforce's Lightning Design System, QuickSwitch offers a sleek, intuitive interface.
Lightweight & Fast: Built for speed, it ensures smooth performance and minimal load times.
No more wasting time—enhance your Salesforce experience with QuickSwitch today!
